## IService interface

A service is a module that encapsulates common functionality in some area

A service is part of the UI layer, but will service all applications using the features that the service provides.

This is the base class for all services.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IService 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [subscribe(fn)](./core-ui.iservice.subscribe.md) | Subscribe to changes in the service |
|  [unsubscribe(id)](./core-ui.iservice.unsubscribe.md) | Unsubscribe from changes in the service |
